title: Idyllic Dukezong Ancient Town Escape within China's Spellbinding Shangri-La District
description: Experience high-end opulence at the lavish Hotel Indigo Diqing Moonlight City, an IHG Hotel, ideally located within the picturesque Dukezong Ancient Town. Elegantly appointed, this stylish property blends heritage with sensuous greenery and light-filled spaces to evoke a sense of tranquillity. When not dining or relaxing, explore the nearby Napahai lake and ancient pagodas and uncover the ancient legend of the district.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Diqing Moonlight City, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 1000 East Corridor Jinlong Community, Diqing, YN 674400 Mainland China
